name: AVSpeechSynthesizerDelegate
desc: A delegate protocol that contains optional methods you can implement to respond to events that occur during speech synthesis.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(AVSpeechSynthesizer, didStart: AVSpeechUtterance)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer begins speaking an utterance.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(AVSpeechSynthesizer, willSpeakRangeOfSpeechString: NSRange, utterance: AVSpeechUtterance)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer is about to speak a portion of an utteranceâ€™s text.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(AVSpeechSynthesizer, didPause: AVSpeechUtterance)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer pauses while speaking an utterance.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(AVSpeechSynthesizer, didContinue: AVSpeechUtterance)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer resumes speaking an utterance after pausing.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(AVSpeechSynthesizer, didFinish: AVSpeechUtterance)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer finishes speaking an utterance.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(AVSpeechSynthesizer, didCancel: AVSpeechUtterance)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer cancels speaking an utterance.
